channel.title: Homes on Welcome to He Zhao's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Welcome to He Zhao's Homepage

item.description: I’m a research fellow at Monash University working in Prof. Dinh Phung’s group. I’m interested in statistical machine learning and deep learning. I obtained my PhD from Monash University in 2019, working with Prof. Wray Buntine and Dr. Lan Du, and also collaborating with Prof. Piyush Rai and Prof. Mingyuan Zhou. Before coming to Monash, I received my M.Eng from Nanjing University in 2014 and B.Eng from Nankai University in 2011, respectively.
